value.title: Tracing with Log Analytics and Power BI
value.excerpt: With Log Analytics integration in Power BI, you can now capture Analysis Services trace events easily and over a longer period of time. Combined with the Power BI template report, you can gain a lot of insights into usage of your datasets. With more to come down the road!  Announcing long-term usage

value.title: Using R Visuals with Power BI
value.excerpt: You can take advantage of the R Script showcase to start using R Visuals with your reports. These provide great examples of what your R Script should look like to interact with data and you can compare how your visual looks to the example. value.title: Why and how to use data protection in Power BI
value.excerpt: Data protection in Power BI can help you to prevent data leakage and have confidence in your data approach. Adam explores the data protection capabilities within Power BI using security labels and cloud app security. value.title: Age Calculation in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: Power Query has a simple way of calculating the age. However, because DAX is the popular language in many calculations in Power BI, many are not aware of this function in Power Query. In this video, I am going to show you how easy is to calculate Age in Power BI using Power BI. This method is very useful

value.title: Customer Retention in Power BI   DAX Measures
value.excerpt: Customer retention is one of the most common scenarios of data analysis, which is very useful for business. value.title: Dynamically change the format of values in Power BI
value.excerpt: Can you change the format of a measure or a value in Power BI dynamically?
